mapper.sql: id, title, publish_at, head_img, sub_title, navmenue_id, content, lang
mapper.select: select * from news where lang = #{lang, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY publish_at DESC
mapper.insert: insert into news (id, title, publish_at, head_img, sub_title, navmenue_id, content, lang) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{navmenueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lang, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into news
id,
title,
publish_at,
head_img,
sub_title,
navmenue_id,
content,
lang,

mapper.update:
update news
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publish_at = #{publishAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_title = #{subTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
navmenue_id = #{navmenueId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lang = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update news set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_at = #{publishAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, head_img = #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_title = #{subTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, navmenue_id = #{navmenueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lang = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
